cartoon.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a short film that is made by photographing a series of drawings
cartoon.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: cartoon characters such as Donald Duck
cartoon.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a funny drawing in a newspaper or magazine, especially about politicians or events in the news
cartoon.translation[0].definitions[2].de: a set of drawings that tell a funny story, especially in a newspaper or magazine
cartoon.translation[0].definitions[3].de: a drawing that an artist does before starting to do a painting
